target.generate: SCHEMA: person(ssn, surname, name, boss) INSTANCE: person(ssn: "123", surname: "Smith", name: "xxxx", boss: "John1") person(ssn: "123", surname: "Smith", name: "xxxx", boss: "John2") person(ssn: "321", surname: "Smith", name: "John", boss: "John3")

scenario.dependencies:
ExtEGDs: e1: person(ssn: $ssn, surname: $surname, name: $name, boss: $boss1), $ssn == "123" -> $name == "Jones".
e2: person(ssn: $ssn, surname: $surname, name: $name, boss: $boss1), $ssn == "123" -> $name == "Frank".
